short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows registered users of IRS Solutions Software to download transcripts from IRS e-Services.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows registered users of IRS Solutions Software to download IRS transcripts from IRS e-Services for the taxpayers that they have a power of attorney or tax information authorization on file with the IRS. After logging in with the IRS you are authorizing IRS Solutions to download and store tax transcripts on your behalf.
